launchpad_s_plus

Class DisplayBlink

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • launchpad_s_plus.DisplayBlink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DisplayBlink
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class used by Display.java to start blinking lights. Pretty much the same functions. Except they are significantly simpler to use if called from the Display class.

    This should never be called directly from any games or animations. Only use Display.java
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisplayBlink

        DisplayBlink()
        Unused Constructor

      • DisplayBlink

        public DisplayBlink(int positionI,
                    int positionJ,
                    java.lang.String color,
                    int intensity,
                    int period)
        For all the blinking colors having the same INTENSITY value:

        Starts blinking (two colors) a pad based on the given input parameters. If the intensity is 0, stop blinking the pad
        Parameters:
        positionI - X location of the pad
        positionJ - Y location of the pad
        color - String value of the first color to blink with
        intensity - Intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        period - Time delay for blinking

      • DisplayBlink

        public DisplayBlink(int positionI,
                    int positionJ,
                    java.lang.String color1,
                    java.lang.String color2,
                    int intensity,
                    int intensity2,
                    int period)
        Constructor for DisplayBlink
        Parameters:
        positionI - X location of the pad
        positionJ - Y location of the pad
        color1 - String value of the first color to blink with
        color2 - String value of the second color to blink with
        intensity - First intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        intensity2 - Second intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        period - Time delay for blinking

      • DisplayBlink

        public DisplayBlink(int positionI,
                    int positionJ,
                    java.lang.String color1,
                    java.lang.String color2,
                    java.lang.String color3,
                    int intensity,
                    int intensity2,
                    int intensity3,
                    int period)
        For all the blinking colors having the same INTENSITY value:

        Starts blinking (three colors) a pad based on the given input parameters. If the intensity is 0, stop blinking the pad
        Parameters:
        positionI - X location of the pad
        positionJ - Y location of the pad
        color1 - String value of the first color to blink with
        color2 - String value of the second color to blink with
        color3 - String value of the third color to blink with
        intensity - First intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        intensity2 - Second intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        intensity3 - Third intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        period - Time delay for blinking

        public static void blink(int positionI,
                         int positionJ,
                         java.lang.String col,
                         int intensity,
                         int delay)
                  throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        For all the blinking colors having the same INTENSITY value:

        Starts blinking (on and off) a pad based on the given input parameters. If the intensity is 0, stop blinking the pad
        Parameters:
        positionI - X location of the pad
        positionJ - Y location of the pad
        col - String value of the color to blink with
        intensity - Intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        delay - Time delay for blinking
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - Invalid Midi Data Exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thread Interrupted Exception

        /** For all the blinking colors having different INTENSITY values:

        Starts blinking (two colors) a pad based on the given input parameters. If the intensity is 0, stop blinking the pad

        positionJ - Y location of the pad

        For all the blinking colors having different INTENSITY values:

        Starts blinking (three colors) a pad based on the given input parameters. If the intensity is 0, stop blinking the pad
        Parameters:
        positionI - X location of the pad
        positionJ - Y location of the pad
        col - String value of the first color to blink with
        col2 - String value of the second color to blink with
        col3 - String value of the third color to blink with
        intensity - First intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        intensity2 - Second intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        intensity3 - Third intensity value to blink with (3 max)
        delay - Time delay for blinking
        Throws:

        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thread Interrupted Exception

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the thread which constitutes a blinking pad. Thread ends when the blinking[i][j] is set to false
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
        See Also:
        Runnable.run()

      • setBlink

        public static void setBlink(int positionI,
                            int positionJ,
                            boolean status)
                     throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Set a certain pad to blink or to stop
        Parameters:
        positionI - X location of the pad
        positionJ - Y location of the pad
        status - True as long as it blinks - False to stop blinking
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - Invalid Midi Data Exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thread Interrupted Exception
